PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-14112019-12-19,  ,  PSPC,  , 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Letter Mail Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the LETTER MAIL REGULATIONS, made on August 22, 2019 by the Canadian Post Corporation, in order to help Canada Post continue to meet its universal service obligation, to offer an accessible, affordable and cost-effective postal service to all Canadians no matter where they live and to operate on a self-sustaining financial basis.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0005 Publication Date: 2020-01-08
AttachmentsAttachment
